resources.string: To work with the character editor, you need to allow the application to access the file system of the device. Just click "Allow" and you will be able to work with the editor!
It looks like you are not allowed to ask you for permission. Now, you should enable permissions through the app settings.
Sorry, you haven\'t granted required permissions. Next time just click "Allow" and you can easy edit your character!

This application was created for educational purposes and is not intended to be of any benefit. There will never be ads in the app. The application will receive regular updates, and its functionality will be filled with new features. All questions and suggestions can be addressed to the official publics on social networks: \n https://www.facebook.com/groups/amonguseditor \nhttps://vk.com/among_us_editor
